Good game, pretty fun to experience it with friends as a survivor, the only downside so far beyond cheesy killer/survivor strats and some toxic players here and there (as both Killer and Survivors) is by far EasyAnticheat, every so often it will Randomly decide that the files of the game have been modified and lock you outside of the game and this is an issue known by the devs yet is still there and is probably the most rage inducing of all since it happens at random to random ppl and the only known way to deal with it is by deleting and reinstalling the game which can be a problem during a play session with friends.

The community of this game needs therapy

The general concept is really good.  The problem is matchmaking is poor which is exacerbated by overpowered item and trait combos which work or don't work based on what amounts to luck.  Game isn't balanced and too few games where it feels too close to call or that the momentum even swings at all.
best game to laugh and get scared with at the same time with friends :)

I hate huntress but the game is lit

(EDITED from good review to bad) the game has become hot garbage, bs hitbox, bs internet problems that the game tries to tie on us, random CTD's that will for whatever reason still ban you from matchmaking, I've had well...... 5 crashes that whenever I come back the game has prohibited me from playing for a longer period of time consecutively each time.

New killers that aren't licensed are aither recycled ideas or just forgotten trash killers, had plenty of matches where I somehow get dunked on by the lamest player just because their killer was not properly implemented, want some examples? okay.

The artist: maybe I'm just unlucky as shit but half the artists I come across are crow spammers, campers, whiny babies post chat cause their start didn't work, or just get a bs hit from a corner angle because their weird swing animation, which looks like she swing her arm as a blade, but there is some dark goo shit that counts as part of her hitbox which makes unclear if she hit you or not, also also not to mention the bs few inches of distance, this seems like a major general issue more than nothing.

The dredge is more of the same, except it is a better Onryo, semi-nurse cause of his limitless teleportation, also same bs hitbox mechanism, some of these derranged players are pretty damn good which by far I believe makes him the best killer at the moment.

the Onryo: I've seen many instances where I get tagged by a killer from yards away after; vaulting a window, vaulting a fence from a second floor, or vaulting a pallet with just about every killer, even if my ping is 24ms but none of them compare to the onry, besides her stupid "hit" animation, she is literally a invisible ghost, can't turn invisible for a long period of time, shorter than the spirit, sneakier, shittier hitbox, which makes her a dumb killer to go against.

Now it seems I'm ranting as a survivor, but in reality I got nothing to say whenever I play as killer, maybe cause of the issue I've stated, I mostly just play Oni cause he is the only killer I play very well. Any other killer requires you to become a sweat lord unless you were already proficient with them here I'll type down my personal experience with the four base ones for new players.

The Trapper feels like the type of killer that whenever you're looking for traps and places to trap, the moment you initiate your first chase, three gens get popped for some reason, like what do you want me to do BHVR not trap loops? it is astonishing how quick you'll lose a match for a few wasted seconds. so I'd suggest using perks such as corrupt intervention, look it up.

the hillbilly feels a bit off, you can play him very good, except some maps are not his forte at all, and you'll be basically hitting every damn invisible hitbox from left over crates, also he is horrible around loops with 2 windows and a pallet nearby.

the nurse is a rough one, she is hard to learn.... very, but once mastered it is plenty of satisfying, but should you ever stop playing her, you'll forget how to use her and will have to learn her again, I'm not taking in consideration all the countless hours you have to play as her to even learn a bit.

the wraith isn't bad, NO, it just he really needs some sweat poured on your keyboard, mostly because against good loopers you will always lose a neuron, they will always find a way to ruin your day as he has got not looping capabilities besides his bing bong that gives him a speed boost, but there's certain loops where you're just going to have to accept a defeat.

and the last one would be the Huntress, now by all means she is dangerous af in the right hand, her hatchet hitbox is bs I reckon that, but this is BHVR we're talking about here, they would rather release an infinite number of dumb cosmetics, argue whether a fictional character is gay or not, than to fix their own damn game, anyways if you're going to play the huntress, always try to hatchet even if you encounter someone and you've got them right in front of your face, trust me they'll love it,

Also personal rant, all perks that are being "reworked" I want to say üñïüñï you BHVR, I've seen this before in rainbow six siege where a company kills a game over a chart, this would've never happened if all perks where balanced in the first place... as in pros and cons.
This gmae is defnitly one of the scarest games ive ever played. almsot shit myslef when playing alone at 9:30 (past my bedtime!!)

Dead By Daylight √© um jogo bem original e divertido. N√£o sou um apreciador do g√™nero de filmes terror (principalmente porque a maioria deles √© muito ruim), mas √© legal poder jogar com personagens cl√°ssicos desses filmes como Michael Meyers (Helloween), Ghostface (Scream), Leatherface (Texas Chain Saw Massacre) e Freddy Krueger (Nightmare on Elm Street).

O gameplay 4x1 funciona muito bem, onde os sobreviventes precisam evitar o assassino e n√£o podem causa-lo mal algum. Enquanto o assassino tem que completar os objetivos de sacrificar os sobreviventes para a entidade.

Os gr√°ficos s√£o razo√°veis, como √© comum em jogos indie. Os personagens s√£o bem modelados e as anima√ß√µes s√£o razo√°veis, j√° as texturas n√£o s√£o bem trabalhadas.
A maioria dos problemas de instabilidade mais graves foram corrigidos e hoje em dia √© um jogo bem recomend√°vel.

Would not recommend getting it, it's fun for what it is but gets super repetitive over time. There are tons of bugs, hackers everywhere and the hit boxes are tremendously huge if you're playing survivor things that should miss you hit just look up huntress semi truck hatchets on youtube. Would really not recommend this game, I have 556 hours on the game because I have family and friends that play otherwise I wouldn't bother. This game is vastly tuned to killers and if you're even moderately good at killer you'll easily kill all the survivors with 2-3 gens left, there is no viable match making in the game because a rank 20 (Bottom of the totem pole) killers has been paired against my friends / family and I who are all rank 1 survivors. <---(Best you can be.) DO NOT BUY UNTIL THEY FIX STUFF.

Apesar de ser extremamente desbalanceado e ter constantes bugs que atrapalham a gameplay, Dead by Daylight √© um jogo com uma tem√°tica bem interessante e divertido de se jogar, principalmente com amigos. Recomendo pegar em uma promo√ß√£o!
I have a realshionship of love and hate with this fucking game, but is a excellent game

This game blows straight dick. There is nothing you can do to make this game fun besides playing killer. I feel like all the devs did was do some blow and produce the shittiest fucking game on the market. The developers do nothing but favor killers, and then when they get complaints about it, say that It isnt their fault and that its latency or our problem because our internet is bad. They would rather not admit that their hitboxes fucking suck and the killers in general are too unfair. Not only that, but you have killers that can easily use abilities to 1-hit down survivors and other killers that prove a survivors skills worthless. For example, you could play against the doctor and Lose him, 360 him and whatever other in game slang you want to use. You could completely bamboozle the fuck and then wait.. HE CROSS MAP SHOCKS YOU and then he knows where you are again. I come back to this game time and time again simply to play 1 match, and want to kill myself. They need to fix their game or just fucking take it down. I wish I could get my money back that I spent on this game but ofc thats not how this works. Dont buy this fucking game its terrible. I could not name a worse fucking game than this one.

Time for an update: Still the same. Two Content patches since last review. Balance is now even worser, Solo-Q is as frustrating as it can get, expect to be tunneled and camped in almost every match. Playing SWF with friends is okay, because of talking to friends in discord/ts. Game became a huge disappointment. It had so much potential, but they just ruin it with every patch even more. Sad, very sad (TM)

Played for almost 50hours now, very addictive game.  Good game overall, main complaints are:
1. playing as killer has long waits (so I 95% play survivor)
2. as survivor, it feels like killer is easy mode and a little unfair (can get salty)

overall, like the game, do recommend it.

Pretty good competitive asymmetrical multiplayer game. The horror feel doesn't last for long, but the simple yet effective gameplay keeps it entertaining. The game doesn't feel stale even after 80+ hours poured into it. Definitely recommend it.
